channel.title: Comments on: Who discovered the Leech lattice?

item.title: By: Marat Gizatullin
item.dc:creator: Marat Gizatullin
item.description: One can add a reference to more ancient part of the history. See my paper “Combinatorics associated with inflections and bitangents of plane quartics”, Izv. RAN. Ser. Mat., 77:4 (2013), 31–54; Izv. Math., 77:4 (2013), 675–695
item.content:encoded:
One can add a reference to more ancient part of the history.
See my paper “Combinatorics associated with inflections and bitangents of plane quartics”, Izv. RAN. Ser. Mat., 77:4 (2013), 31–54; Izv. Math., 77:4 (2013), 675–695
